tips.title: Getting Started
tips.subTitle: Start making projects in Scratch by trying the online tutorial or downloading the PDF Guide.
tips.tttBody: What do you want to make with Scratch? For each activity, you can try the Tutorial, download a set of Activity Cards, or view the Educator Guide.
tips.cardsHeader: Get the Entire Collection of Activity Cards
tips.cardsBody: With the Scratch Activity Cards, you can learn to create interactive games, stories, music, animations, and more!
tips.starterProjectsBody: You can play with Starter Projects to get ideas for making your own projects.
tips.offlineEditorBody: To create projects without an Internet connection, you can download the offline editor.
tips.questionsBody: Have more questions? See the Frequently Asked Questions or visit the Help with Scripts Forum.
ttt.tutorialSubtitle: Faigh a-mach ciamar a nì thu am pròiseact seo le oideachadh ceum air cheum ann an Scratch.
ttt.activitySubtitle: Rùraich beachdan còdachaidh ùra leis na cairtean dealbhaichte seo as urrainn dhut clò-bhualadh.
ttt.educatorSubtitle: Cleachd treòir an luchd-foghlaim seo gus bùth-obrach Scratch a chur air dòigh 's a stiùireadh a mhaireas uair a thìde.
ttt.MakeItFlyDescription: Beòthaich cat Scratch, na Powerpuff Girls no fiù 's taco!
ttt.AnimateYourNameDescription: Beòthaich litrichean d' fhar-ainm no am facal as fhearr leat.
ttt.RaceDescription: Dèan geama far an ruith dithis rèis.
ttt.MakeMusicDescription: Tagh innealan-ciùil, cuir fuaimean ris agus brùth air iuchraichean gus ceòl a chluiche.
ttt.HideAndSeekDescription: Cruthaich geama falach-fead le pearsachan a nochdas 's a thèid am falach.
ttt.StoryDescription: Tagh pearsachan, cuir còmhradh ris agus innis do sgeulachd leotha.
ttt.FashionDescription: Cruthaich geama far an cuir thu aodaich is stoidhlichean eadar-dhealaichte air pearsa.
ttt.PongDescription: Cruthaich geama le bàla a' bocadh aig a bheil fuaimean, puingean is èifeachdan eile.
ttt.DanceDescription: Dealbhaich sealladh dannsa beòthaichte le ceòl is gluasadan dannsa.
ttt.CatchDescription: Cruthaich geama far an glac thu nithean a thuiteas às an adhar.
ttt.VirtualPetDescription: Cruthaich peata eadar-ghnìomhach a dh'itheas, dh'òlas is chluicheas.
